customer_name: FARM RIVER WILDLIFE RESCUE & REHABILITATION INC
site_name: FARM RIVER WILDLIFE RESCUE & REHABILITATION INC

citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:30 PM on 4/4/23.
The inspector arrived at 3:30 PM on 4/4/23 to conduct an inspection. The inspector attempted to contact the Licensee by
phone/text on arrival and did speak with a family member. The Licensee was at distant off-site location and would not be
available until later that evening. An AWA compliance inspection could not be conducted because there was no other
authorized facility representative available to accompany the inspector.
Unannounced inspections are used to evaluate compliance with the AWA Regulations and Standards. This is the FIRST
attempted inspection of the Licensee.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:30 PM on 4/4/23.  
 
The inspector arrived at 3:30 PM on 4/4/23 to conduct an inspection. The inspector attempted to contact the Licensee by 
phone/text on arrival and did speak with a family member. The Licensee was at distant off-site location and would not be 
available until later that evening. An AWA compliance inspection could not be conducted because there was no other 
authorized facility representative available to accompany the inspector.  
 
Unannounced inspections are used to evaluate compliance with the AWA Regulations and Standards. This is the FIRST 
attempted inspection of the Licensee. 
 
 
 
End Section
